verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 4:6
verses.text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter: because that the Lord is the avenger of all such, as we also have forewarned you and testified.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 4:7
verses.text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness, but unto holiness.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 4:8
verses.text: He therefore that despiseth, despiseth not man, but God, who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 4:9
verses.text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you: for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another.
